info.author: Keith Jackson
info.description:
The goal of this project is to allow the use of the entire  Globus
toolkit from Python, a high-level scripting language.  SWIG is used to generate
the necessary interface code.  Currently the majority of the 2.4 versions and
later of the Globus toolkit have been wrapped
info.name: pyGlobus
info.html_description: The goal of this project is to allow the use of the entire Globus toolkit from Python, a high-level scripting language. SWIG is used to generate the necessary interface code. Currently the majority of the 2.4 versions and later of the Globus toolkit have been wrapped
